Row.Text: Our military forces will be much improved if we establish a new elite cavalry unit to defend our nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Kurdistan. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]700 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Mounted units receive a +20% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat bonus in friendly territory and may receive defensive terrain bonuses. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Every city with a Barracks receives a free Stable.

Our military forces will be much improved if we establish a new elite cavalry unit to defend our nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Mounted units receive a +20% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat bonus in friendly territory. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Every city with a Barracks receives a free Stable.

The New Year holiday of Newroz was practiced by our ancestors to celebrate our deliverance from tyranny and to denounce the devil and his ways. We shall revive this holiday to commemorate our history and culture. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Kurdistan. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Most city must follow your religion. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]200 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities following your religion will enter We Love the King Day whenever you enter a new era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+5 [ICON_PEACE] on Landmarks.

The New Year holiday of Newroz was practiced by our ancestors to celebrate our deliverance from tyranny and to denounce the devil and his ways. We shall revive this holiday to commemorate our history and culture. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities following your religion will enter We Love the King Day whenever you enter a new era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+5 [ICON_PEACE] on Landmarks.

Our people are now being referred to as :poop: by a shady man who claims not to be a Turk. Not gonna lie, you guys have it pretty shitty. I don't know why my people decided to follow your ways but I still fear the rest of the world will succumb to your culture somehow.
